title: Genie font... any ideas
content:
Hi, does anyone have any idea what font the attached is? Even if you know something thats very similar to the "g" and "e". The "g" is perfect for what I require. Many thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [genie-2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113827/http:/typophile.com/files/genie-2.png) | 16.5 KB |
author: toddkaust

comments.content: Looks custom to me and /g totally made from scratch but could be wrong. For "enie", you could start with some geometric sans like [Avant-Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113827/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic) Bold and cut crossbars. I don't know how to reproduce this /g (which looks terrible for me) and I don't know any font that could fit it unfortunately. The best way would probably be to entirely draw it. You could start for instance with Avant-Garde Gothic /o and add it a custom leg of your own. An easy alternative would be [Kabel](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015113827/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/kabel).
Cheers Ryuk. Kabel looks very close and I will give that a go with some adjustments. Nice work.
that g is making me twitch.

Looks like an awkward crescent moon.  
Don
